ADR Director
ADR Script Writer | yearsactive = | gender = Female | status = | title = | family = | spouse = | children = | relatives = | ethnic = | religion = | salary = | networth = | website = | credits = | website = | agent = }} '''Colleen Smith Clinkenbeard''' (born April 13, 1980 in [[Shreveport, Louisiana|Shreveport]], [[Louisiana]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[voice actress]], [[Line Producer]], [[dubbing (filmmaking)|ADR Director]], and [[scriptwriting|Script Writer]] who works for [[Funimation Entertainment]], [[ADV Films]], and OkraTron 5000. She has provided voices for a number of English language versions of Japanese [[anime]] films and series, most notably, [[Monkey D. Luffy]] in ''[[One Piece]]''. ==Anime== * ''[[AM Driver]]'' - Mary Fastia * ''[[Genesis of Aquarion|Aquarion]]'' - Hong Lihua/Reika * ''[[Baccano!]]'' - Nice Holystone * ''[[Baka and Test]]'' - Yoko Takahashi * ''[[Baldr Force EXE Resolution]]'' -
